mapper.insert: insert into t_book (id,book_name,transaction_xid) values(#{id, jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{bookName, jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{transactionXid, jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update t_book set id=#{id, jdbcType=VARCHAR},book_name=#{bookName, jdbcType=VARCHAR},transaction_xid=#{transactionXid, jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id=#{id}
